name: Gear Aid Tenacious Tape Gore-Tex Fabric Patches
description: Repair tears and holes in your Gore-Tex® garment with this patch kit.Kit contains two pressure-sensitive patches manufactured from the same Gore-Tex fabric used in garments.An aggressive, high-strength adhesive has been bonded to the laminate and sealed with an easy-to-remove backing.One round patch, 7.62cm diameter.One rectangular patch, 5.08 x 10.16cm.
